item.description:
Hi All,

The BAA half marathon goes on sale today and will likely only be open for 24-48 hours before selling out.

It's the official Boston half marathon so if you're going to ever run a half then this would be the one!

Registration etc. is here - http://www.bostonmara...

I'll update this later regarding a meeting place etc. on the day of the race.

Take care, Martin

p.s. you're responsible for signing up yourself etc. etc.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Organized Race - BAA half marathon
